Introduction

Yoo Kihyun is a South Korean singer, actor, and composer under Starship Entertainment. He is best known as the main vocalist of the boy group Monsta X. He also takes part in writing and composing their songs.

Kihyun debuted as a member of MONSTA X on May 14, 2015 with their first mini-album "Trespass".

Kihyun made his solo debut on March 15, 2022, with his solo single album “VOYAGER”.
On June 9, 2022, it was announced that he had renewed his contract with Starship Entertainment.
